import { useState } from "react" const New=()=>{ const[obj,setObj]=useState({ fullname:"", contact:0, commercials:0, experience:0, expert:"" }) let his=useHistory() const track=(e)=>{ const{name,value}=e.target; setObj((old)=>{ return{ ...old, [name]:value } }) } const update=async()=>{ await adding(obj) his.push('/') } return( <>
); } export default New;
